long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces a few overused strong words on Aftonbladet.se with less strong words for people who don't like the adjective inflation that is going on. It replaces the word "super" with "normal", "chaos" with "slightly messy" (except in Swedish, of course), etc.
